conbody.p:
A Design Studio server provides a connection to a T24 environment. A server is a project with a name and properties. Your workspace can hold many servers, pointing to one or many T24 environments. A server can be either:
jAgent: T24 JBase_agent, providing a listening port on remote server.
Web Service: communication service over the WEB. This is the type of server required for TAFJ installation.
Design Studio server replaces previous connectors setting, such as:
TAF/C Site Manager
T24 Web service
Integration Framework
